DOC.brief_summary: Shoulder problem cause substantial disability daily living , work , leisure activity , exercise . The presence shoulder problem rotator cuff pathology report highly predictive impaired health-related quality life . Many test use physical examination shoulder . The reliability validity test study . However , systemic review conclude conflict evidence reliability combine test . Functional examination shoulder Cyriax compose series test evaluate shoulder problem . It include three arm elevation , three test glenohumeral joint , six resist test . As far investigator know , correlation Cyriax functional examination ultrasonographic finding never report . Therefore , aim study compare clinical diagnosis Cyriax 's functional examination ultrasound finding patient shoulder pain .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Cyriax 's Functional Examination Ultrasound Examination Patients With Shoulder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: There two group fifty patient group . First group patient unilateral bilateral shoulder pain outpatient clinic Department Physical Medicine Rehabilitation Shin Kong Wu Ho-Su Memorial Hospital . The group control group shoulder problem . Both group receive Cyriax 's functional examination shoulder history taking , examine shoulder ultrasound one week .
DOC.criteria: Study group : 1. patient unilateral bilateral shoulder pain unknown cause ; 2. age≥ 20 year old . Control group : 1. patient without unilateral bilateral shoulder pain ; 2. age≥ 20 year old . 1 ) chronic inflammatory joint disease , infection tumor shoulder , previous fracture surgery shoulder , refer pain cervical origin visceral organ .
